name: Nokia Defence
description:
Nokia Defence imagines what a Tower Defense game would be like if it were written for the Nokia 3310. Fight off waves of 3 different creeps on 2 different maps using upgradable laser-firing defence towers.

A game by Siôn le Roux using a hand-crafted game engine and the Ebiten library with music by Balázs Kormos and graphics by Milán Verb.

Please rate your experience and leave a comment with some feedback :)

Feeling curious? You can check daily updates on  the Twitter feed or browse the source code in the Github repo.
